Text:

This is not episode 4. episode 4 is acceptance, this is happiness
Is this Happiness or is it Acceptance? Do I have to find out on my own?
According to the Wiki Happiness is the first episode and Acceptance is the forth episode.
If you do find out for your own, could you let the rest of us know please?
This is season 1 episode 4, "Acceptance", in the US version of the TV series Wilfred. Hope this clears things up for everyone
I hope this is ep.4, BBC are showing this in UK, but I work nights and can't get it on BBC iPlayer. Thanks in advance feller!
